summary: A woman falls for a charming and mysterious businessman. The whirlwind romance turns sour when she is framed for his underworld crimes. Now, finally out of prison she is ready for sweet revenge.
cast: Saif Ali Khan|Urmila Matondkar|Seema Biswas|Aditya Srivastav|Pratima Kazmi|Madan Joshi|Zakir Hussain|Abhay Bhargava|Rasika Oak|Seema Adhikari|Sheeba Chaddha|Rasika Joshi|Kavita Kaushik|Gulfam Khan|Murari Kumar|Sima Raaj|Rajendra Sethi|Gopal Singh|Yogendra Singh Waldia
title: Ek Hasina Thi
